raw_body: DIRCKZE – KAMINI – Loving wife of late Wing. Cmd. Tony Dirckze,​ mother of Rapti and Ravi Dirckze and loving Nana of Raoul and Racquel,​ daughter of J.R.T. and Mary Pereira,​ sister of Chitra Corera and late Ranjit Pereira. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour at 10.00 a.m. on Saturday the 7th of October. Cortege leaves parlour on the same day at 4.00 p.m. for cremation at 4.30 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (New Crematorium).063451
